text: N’igihe umuntu ahuye n’ingorane aradusaba muburyo ubwaribwo bwose ashoboye, hanyuma aryamiye urubavu canke yicaye canke ahagaze, mugabo tumukuriyeho ivyo bibazo vyiwe, aca abigira nkuko atamye adutakambira ngo tumukurireho izo ngorane yari afise, uku rero niko basharijwe abantu barenga imbibe kuvyo bahora bagira
